column1: MRI image size (256, 128, 1) of the head of a man of 37 years old with weighting in T2, of axial section. We observe slice n°153 beginning from the base of the skull. The observed details include: the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 4204.2480 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 3864.1113 mm³, the left lateral ventricle of volume 17.1387 mm³, the left caudate nucleus of volume 13.1836 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 4176.5625 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 3836.4258 mm³, the right lateral ventricle of volume 68.5547 mm³ and the right caudate nucleus of volume 22.4121 mm³.
